name: about
text:
About me

Iʼm Pedro, I come from Mexico and I made this website with love from scratch. I am a UX, UI and visual designer with a background in web development. I think details are what makes life worth living, and in keeping with this, I strive to create nice, thoughtful little things that make me —and hopefully others— want to use them.

I am currently looking for an internship to complete my Digital Media Creative program at Hyper Island, so if you think my work is interesting feel free to contact me.
